reviews.review: Excellent game with a compelling backstory and mind-bendingly complex puzzles. This should be a part of every steam library.
This game is like a Portal into gaming heaven.

Portal defined a new genre, Portal 2 expanded it. This game has only one major problem - it ends. But Valve solved this problem with zillions of fan-made test chambers you can solve after you've finished the game. Or make your own! Not to mention the multiplayer, which is a tremendous fun. If you don't yet have it, I can't imagine a reason why you shouldn't have it. And it runs on a Mac beautifully.
Absolutley loved it, recommend it! BUY IT.
Great game, currently on sale for just £3.74!! Go get it now!

Portal 2 is a fun and witty game one of which you will actually enjoy being insulted by giant robot named GLaDOS, the puzzles range from easy to very difficult, but upon completing a difficult puzzle you feel like you accomplished something, which is rare in many games today. Portal 2 not only has an entertainingly fun and challenging single player, but also an extremely fun co-op campaign separate from the single player campaign. The Co-Operative gameplay of portal 2 is some of the most fun you will ever have with a friend or your significant other. If you’re anything like me you will consistently be looking for good co-op games to play and find out the hard truth that there aren’t many to be had. With the lack of good co-op games to play, Portal 2 is a defiant must have, and one of the best co-op games you will play for years to come.  Valve is one of the few developers I don’t have anything bad to say about, their games are consistently in great quality and in great fun. Over all I highly recommend Portal 2 to anyone looking for both a good game to play on their own, but also with a friend. 

Pros:

+ Co-Op
+ Story progression
+ Remember-able and Fun characters
+ Amazing set pieces
+ Gameplay
+ Graphics
+ Sounds
+ Atmosphere

Cons:
- The game eventually like all things, ends.

Score:

10 out of 10

This game builds on the original gamplay that made the first Portal very good, but in making a full-length game, it brought out something that was not an issue in the short original. This game gets pretty boring in the middle. Because the main character is silent and spends most of her time alone, the game relies entirely on Wheatly or GLaDOS to provide personality. Much like any form of gameplay that isn't substatiated by story or interesting characters, the blue and organe protal system gets boring. There are several large portions of the game in which both Wheatly and GLaDOS are completely silent, like when I spend an hour in silence while trying to figure out hard puzzles. I understand that those two can't be an endless source of sarcasm and funny quotes lest they become dry, but a full-length game needs to account for these silent empty spaces. There is a limit to how much ambiance can make up for a lack of personality.

In all this is a really good game when it gets moving. I loved hearing Cave Johnson talk about science so haphazardly, and the vocal characters are excellent companions. While I cannot recommend this game if you have Norton Internet Security (since it hates the Source Engine), I can say that it is worth a purchase, especially since it goes on sale for $5 all of the time.
The Portal games are some of the best puzzle games ever made. While Portal 2 is amazing on it's own, I highly recommend playing Portal 1 first to get the best narrative effect.

Хотя идея порталов не нова, например в игре Prey, которая вышлана год раньше PORTAL, тоже используются порталы, и даже выглядят похоже (кто у кого идею стырил?*), а раньше воще была Half-Life, Duke Nukem 3D   и Quаke (не вдаваясь в детали, телепорты и порталы, по сути одно и тоже). Однак в PORTAL и PORTAL2 эта идея доведена до логического конца - игрок сам может создавать порталы, и  портальная пушка является единственным иструментом для прохождения игры. В самом деле, зачем нам растреливать турель, если её можно  просто  провалить куда нибудь. Хотя брешу- основной инструмент для прохождения  игры - это мозги игрока. Игра полна головоломистых уровней, прохождение которых не даст заскучать, и что самое вкусное, всё это связано  неплохой сюжетной линией, причём сюжет второго PORTAL  продолжает историю первого. Так  что для получения   удовольствия, повышения ЧСВ и прочего, крайне рекомендуюется пройти сингл обоих игр, Оно того стоит. Ну а когда, захочется  сладкого, можно пригласить товарища пошпилить в кооперативе, причём для этого режима, совсем другие головоломки, так что не надоест проходить одно и тоже по второму разу. Режим  кооператива, думается мне, даже более крут,  чем сингл. Ибо, как народна мудрость гласит - "за компанию даже жид удавился",  в компании с лучшим врагом/злейшим другом проходить намного интересней. Таки, ента первая игра, которую йя за бабки купил, до ентого пользовал исключительно пиратские версии, как истинный патриот )) 
Специально ничего не написал о уровнях,  ибо лучше всего увидеть всё своими глазами,  да и услышать тоже -  озвучка сделана  на железную пятёрку, один только голос злобного   ГЛэДОС чего стоит...

 Посему  рРррекомендую всем, мальчикам и девочкам и недевочкам тоже )))

Even it's single player game with one story line (you cannot walk much around because there is only one start and exit in each phase) the game itself is a masterpiece.
I played over and over again, and i know how many puzzles works, but even so it will use my brains pretty good. It will never get bored, lol... The story line has also great humour. You will laugh sometimes or with big smile.
The story is still beautiful and when in the middle of the story line, you are in the best part of the game: far underground, in the biggest puzzle cave. That part is always the best of all levels. Even game is from 2011, the graphics are still at good level.

The dynamic world with unlimited portal effects still amazing every time. I know Valve has many problems to solve the complex dynamic portals (camera and project interaction through portals) but they did it.
And the challenge to make puzzle yourself or solve puzzles from others, makes the game timeless fun with Workshop.

Actually, i want next gen Portal 3.... with even more amazing world views. Will Valve do it again? If they can make it one more time, i will buy it with happy face! Portal forever! :-) 10/10 points!

Portal 2 is much better than Portal 1. The reason? The game is much cleverer. It is richer, more beautiful, more attractive than Portal 1's science lab environment. And of course, there's Wheatley...  perhaps one of the funniest NPC a gamer can encounter in his or her videogame experience. Just for that, P2 is better than the 1st. But then, there's also the exploration of the Aperture Labs of the past, and this is where the player understands that Valve's work was here to create an entire universe, compared to the gimmicky P1.
Pretty fun, awfully short and the MP is a pain (you can (almost) only play with people in your friends list), but it is probably one of the best CO-OP gameplay out there, in the digital wild. Go get it on sales, if you're not prone to headaches... because oh boy you will have quite a few!

Еще одна игра, которую практически не ждал и которая свалилась на голову приятным сюрпризом. Уже через 10-15 минут геймплея стало понятно, что планка качества, установленная первой частью игры, успешно поднята еще выше.

Играть все также интересно. Пространственные задачки довольно логичны и не вызывают каких-то особых трудностей. Сюжетная сторона стала еще прекраснее, особенно с учетом того, что стараниями разработчиков было добавлено еще больше забавных ситуаций и отсылок. Концовка же вообще получилась очень неожиданной.

Единственный недостаток - слишком короткая получилась игра. Сюжетная часть проходится довольно быстро, и если хочется продолжения, то можно попробовать свои силы в прохождении или создании пользовательских уровней-головоломок. Да, еще вроде бы есть увлекательный кооператив, но я, к сожалению, все еще его не опробовал.

Sucesor del genial Portal que solo se puede calificar de obra maestra.

Después de los sucesos del primer título nos encontramos con esta historia y digo historia porque es el rasgo que más a evolucionado respecto a su predecesor. Pero no solo tiene un gran guión, si no que tiene muchos más niveles (y más complicados), nuevos objetos; como los puentes de luz o los geles, y un modo multijugador cooperativo para 2 jugadores en el que cada jugador tendrá un solo portal.

Volveremos a controlar a Chell que despierta despues de lo ocurrido en Portal e intentará salir del complejo de Aperture Science ahora sin GLaDOS y con un nuevo y esférico amigo, Wheatley un módulo de personalidad que nos hará de guia.
Just buy it already!

If you don't own this game by now, what the hell? the amount of times its been on sale! If you have been undecided, decide and buy the darn game! its great fun! workshop integration is good as well.

Portal 2 é o tipo de jogo que, se seu inglês for de nível médio para cima (no sentido auditivo), lhe garantirá horas de humor, ironia e piadas sem noção, que pegam bem na alma do personagem. E, se você não entender inglês, não se preocupe: a maior parte da diversão do jogo provém de seus desafios, seus puzzles, onde é possível rir por horas a fio com as tentativas (corretas e mais ainda com as erradas) de vencê-los. O modo multiplayer cooperativo é uma das partes mais divertidas e hilárias do jogo, e requer realmente trabalho em equipe: é impossível vencer os puzzles deste modo sozinho, e os robôs, que são controlados pelos jogadores, são ultra simpáticos e engraçados. Uma das melhores aquisições recentes para a minha conta, recomendo!

One of the best games ever made as far as dialogue and characterization. Very reminiscent of great sci fi from ballard or dick. Claustrophobia and the last person on earth.

No tengo la menor duda de que este es el mejor juego de esta generación (de consolas y si, se que esto es PC). Supera en todos los sentidos al primer Portal y (al menos en mi caso) hizo trizas las experiencias que he tendio con los demas juegos que jugado de esta generación (Si, de consolas, ya se que esto es PC).

Es una obra maestra, un clasico instantaneo y uno de los puntos mas brillantes de la historia de los video juegos. No tiene igual y en lo personal, es casi el mejor juego que he jugado en mi vida.

Todo lo anterior se queda corto, es imposible poder describir apropiadamente la grandeza de Portal 2. Tiene todo lo que se necesita para pelearle a los grandes el titulo del mejor video juego de la historia.

Para finalizar solo puedo decir: JUEGUEN PORTAL 2, JUEGUEN PORTAL 2, JUEGUEN PORTAL 2 Y SI NO LES QUEDO CLARO, JUEGUEN PORTAL 2.
